content.detailedDescription: I was on the bus, when i saw a giant black disc behind the moon, it covered everything behind, the stars were entirely not seen. as this occurred for approximately 30 minutes, the lights in the bus. it was stationary until a nearby black helicopter came closer, then it simply disappeared along with the fog surrounding the object. it seemed unnatural but i believed it was something extraterrestrial. later, when i arrived at my location, colleagues also reported the sighting.
content.summary: There was a disk of black behind the moon covering every star behind it.

content.detailedDescription: Was scared, could not move as the lights were incoming and had been almost asleep at the time. boyfriend was asleep, though it was as if i could not wake him / or myself to be able to move. although, i do remember him hugging me though i could not return the gesture... so scared as the lights were all about my apartment, seemed to only be over within a few minutes also. i was wide awake and felt like i was shaking, a totally cold clammy feeling absorbed my whole body and then; nothing. (a sense that i would 'lose everything'.. no explanation.. just scared)
content.summary: Incoming lights toward my apartment, middle of the night, both flashing/fluttering and static

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the car smoking a cigertte my girlfriend ask is that a plane and at first i didn't see it but 2 seconds later there it was just hovering up in the air like it was heading north northeast over a house and at that time i saw one bright yellow light it stopped in the air changed its direction faster than i've ever seen anything do in the sky man made i put my head out the window and then i saw the front of it with a small green light at the tip and two big yellow lights at the back of the ship it went right over my head and i see this bright purple glow underneath the ship flying much much faster than any man made air ship. i get out over the car and get the perfect view of the two bright yellow lights of its back and there it is flying one second and then just puff nothing and the weirdest part of the whole thing nether me or my girlfriend heard one sound. even weirder what kept happening later that night i try to google search how to report ufo sights and all of a sudden my phones swpye feature thats has never had one problem sence i got the phone didnt want to work spelling completly different words then i swyped and like every few seconds my keyboard of my phone would fuzz out or my entire screen would go black and i notcie this white jeep with orange tanish liscensplate tinted black windows blacker than state law park in the middle of the road for like at least two minutes long enough for me to notice it was weird and the second my hand went to open the door the jeep speeds off, my phone worked fine intill this jeep showed up. i called 911 and the lady they sent took it as a huge joke. which was very disresceptful because i saw what i saw and so did my girlfriend she saw the exact same thing i saw that night i felt like i just learned a secret my government didnt want me to know and i wanted answers. i will tell anyone what i saw because that was the craziest thing iv ever seen in my life.
content.summary: I know what i saw it flew right above my head it started off way to low to be a plane and the fact that the nearest airports is about 20 miles away, craziest thing i ever saw.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my bedroom sleeping and awoke. i looked up and saw an 5ft being on my wife's side of the bed. greenish gray skin like a prune in texture with dark wrinkles,large white eyes with large black pupils. the head shape reminded me of a prune it had only molars and a dark colored robe.
i wasn't frightened for some reason. i kept opening and closing my eyes to make sure of what i saw. on my side of the bed on the top of the wall and ceiling there was an spider like robot about 2 feet in diameter. i felt like it was some type of observation device. i wasn't frightened of this ether. the being looked at me and moved its lower jaw and that is when i saw its teeth then they both slowly vanished away in a few seconds. oddly i felt like i was sedated and fell back to sleep.

i have drawn an image of both.

has this happened to anyone in my area?

please help
content.summary: 2 beings in my bedroom

content.detailedDescription:
i had been enjoying a small bonfire with two friends at lydney docks on the edge of the river severn in gloucestershire, uk. it was wednesday 9th of april 2014 and around 21:20 in the evening. we had been in the area since about 19:00 and the sun had set just over half an hour before, the skies were clear and as the sky became darker a good number of stars were visible.

i first noticed a bright light in the direction of the severn bridge to the south-west, slowly tracking in a smooth arc to the east. the object seemed to be at a very high altitude and had no discernable running lights. with its apparent altitude and the time being so close to sunset, i assumed the object to be a satellite and pointed it out to my companions.

for roughly the next ten minutes we watched casually as it passed towards the east. as we did the conversation moved between satellites and other space-related phenomena. i remember stating that the only thing that could convince me that i might not be looking at a satellite of some variety would be a distinct change in direction.

as the object moved further the east a dimmer light became apparent moving in an arc following the same trajectory. whether i noticed this due to a change in magnitude or simply my eyes becoming more light adjusted i am unsure, but after half a minute or so of observation it became clear that the this second object was in fact gaining on the first and would soon catch up.

i duly pointed this out to my fellow observers only to have one of them point out a third object, of the same apparent magnitude of the second, moving downwards from above and on a trajectory that would bring it close to the first two. almost immediately after this i spotted a forth object, again of similar brightness, moving in a diagonal direction, as if to join the other dimmer lights.

all three of the less-bright lights then appeared to converge at point behind the original object. for a couple of seconds all three dim objects seemed to remain still as the original passed along its arc from west to east. the smaller objects then appeared to switch places a couple of times before separating back out in an equidistant pattern similar to an equilateral triangle. one of the lights appeared to follow the original object in a rough trajectory before blinking a number of times and fading out whereas the other two simply faded as they moved further apart.

from a personal perspective this was an awe-inspiring sight. having spent a reasonable amount of time looking skyward in the evenings, even being able to watch something man-made trace an arc amongst the stars is something to admire. this, however distant, i genuinely believe was something else; something beautiful.
content.summary: Gloucestershire, uk: a bright, high-altitude light spotted moving south-west to east. followed and converged upon by three dimmer lights.

content.detailedDescription: Woke up to a cloudy morning that day and was looking outside the balcony while having my morning tea when i noticed an impression of what seems to be an invisible/reflective aircraft in the clouds. it is triangular and is stationary. the clouds gave away the shape and size of the craft which is flying higher than an airplane that is about 5-8mins into take off and is much much bigger. the plane flew past the same line of sight as where the craft was and the invisible craft was about 5 times bigger than the plane even though it's farther away from where i was observing. it is unknown how long the craft stayed there as i have to leave for work. i took a photo of it and will be attaching to this report (raw/unedited).
content.summary: Invisible/reflective ufo hiding in the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the uk, about 3.5 miles from ashby-de-la-zouch. on saturday 11th october 2014, at about 23:10, i went into my back garden to smoke a cigar. as usual, i sat by my garden table and looked up at the stars. it was a very clear night, i could see no visible clouds at all, only stars. after approximately 2 minutes of being outside i noticed a light moving across the sky. it looked to be a satellite, i see these almost every night and it was moving in exactly the same fashion as any normal satellite; i.E.- slowly, following a linear path. the light did not "sparkle" or glisten at all and seemed slightly larger than a normal satellite as seen by the naked eye, but not by much.

after a few seconds of watching the light it stopped perfectly still in the sky, almost blending in with the rest of the stars. i began to think that maybe i had just lost sight of this satellite and now my eyes were focusing on a nearby star without my realising. however, maybe fifteen seconds or so later, the light very slow began to separate. it took about half a minute for the light to split out into three separate lights. the three separate lights, all of the same size, brightness and colour, stayed perfectly still in a triangular formation for about a minute. they seemed different to any other stars in the sky, a little bigger and slightly brighter. then suddenly all three lights began to move again. each light traveled in a different direction, one (the "original" light) heading north, one south east and one south west. i'm not sure of the speed they were moving at but they had left my field of vision within about three seconds; they were fast. unlike normal satellites, these lights did not gradually dim out as they reached the horizon, instead they simply continued to travel at the same speed, in the same direction until i eventually lost sight of them behind nearby trees and houses.

i stayed outside for another 15-20 minutes watching the sky and saw a number of other satellites passing overhead, none of which were like the three lights i had just seen. i saw a number of airplanes fly overhead but none of them were traveling at a speed anywhere near these other lights and, due to being about 11 miles away from east midlands airport, they were low enough to make out the noise from the engines as they passed.
content.summary: Bright light stopped, multiplied and then moved away

content.detailedDescription: My husband was outside and called my brother and i to come look. exactly west of our house above the mountains we noticed a bright white light that was not moving. it gradually got brighter and brighter. we noticed that the light split into 2 smaller lights (the light split from top to bottom, not side to side) and then came back together. we watched through binoculars and could not see anything unusual other than it was very bright. it never seemed to move one way or the other but eventually it started dimming and then would get bright again towards the end, it started strobbing until it just went out. we watched for aprox. 7 minutes and in that i time i called our neighbor whom were also able to observe the last minute or so. i also wanted to confirm with the neighbors that this light was well above any mountain range. the incident started at about 7:29pm and ended about 7:36 pm. on oct. 12th 2014. probably the oddest thing was the military (?) jet that appeared from the same direction of the object (heading from west to east) withing 10 seconds of the light disappearing. the jet was flying above the clouds but the light object was in clear view.
content.summary: Object bright white, split into 2, came back together,brightened again, pulsated intermittently, dimmed and then went out. military aircraft followed seconds after light went out.

content.detailedDescription:
Canada day, 2012 my cousin, his girlfriend and attended an array of events. nonetheless, we all came to an agreement mid-day; to end our it with the evening's exciting firework shows, capping off our nation's 145th birthday.

after making way to an excellent vantage point, providing the spectator with a perfect 360 panorama of the city and surrounding area (atop a hill, due south of calgary near highway 22x) soon after arriving, we were overwhelmed with beautiful explosions of pyro-art, from various communities located within the vicinity! as well as a powerful thunderstorm which engulfed the entire north/east horizon... with loads of lightning, too. 

now, to the north, airplanes arrive and depart on a regular basis...Given calgary's airport location, and we did see a few land n' take off. however, the information i will disclose sure does not support the physical behaviour of an aircraft crafted by man.

while gun-powder diminished from the pyro show, the clouds grew sharper as the air drew pure. with a wicked view of the now featured thunderstorm, which was indeed heading west (towards us) we felt no need to leave. the view was spectacular!

within 15 minutes after all the fireworks had ended, we noticed a rather bright, what a appeared to be an airplane at the time. thinking nothing of it, we continued to watch the thunder storm draw near. after 10 minutes of noticing the bright object in the sky, it soon became the centre of attention, though this time, all three of us had a true suspicion. 

the object hadn't moved at all in that 10 minute span. in fact, it made bizarre diagonal, swirling, shaking and pulsating movements as it got brighter and dimmer. please advise, i cannot provide an approximate duration of the movements for we were all in disbelief at the time. though, near the end of our experience, the craft did become very, very, very bright, began to vibrate, then, became darker than the sky (yes, it was a black dot in the nights stormy sky), topping everything off, it then made a few more sporadic movements in its shadow phase, and shot off, disappeared, directly vertical into the cosmos. 

to this day, we are convinced that this was indeed an extraterrestrial craft, piloted by beings wiser than man. 

disclaimer: 
there is no way the object we saw, was a plane due to its movements. as well as it not being a star due to the severe thunderstorm blanketing the sky that night

**(mp4 video was lost due to computer failure)**
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Canada day ufo sighting (3 witnesses) calgary, ab

content.detailedDescription: It around 10:15 or so when i went in my backyard with my dog, noticed a very low cloud overhead, the only cloud on a still, clear  lubbock night. it caught my attention by being so low and seeming to have a misty quality with spirals of mist coming downwards. it reminded me of steam coming from a low creek on a hot humid summer night. i watched intently 10-15 seconds wondering what could possibly cause such a cloud when my dog ran up to me. i bent over and was petting the dog for only seconds when a bright light seemed to go across my eyes in one direction and then again in another in rapid succession. i looked up and directly overhead was a light. it was passing overhead so i turned 180 degrees and then i could see the entire length of the light, it was greenish white showing through the misty cloud. i was totally awed by the object. it was so low in the sky, a few weeks before hot air balloons had passed overhead at a low altitude and i believe this cloud and object was just as low. it was a solid light in the shape of a boomerang and i would say at least 1/2 mile wide. totally silent moving at a high rate of speed enveloped in a wispy cloud. i watched it as it passed over my house, it was out of sight in only a 5-6 seconds or so. i stood dumbfounded for a few seconds trying to process what i just saw and then ran to the front of my house, jumped in my car. i live near a highway and was able to go towards the cloud for only a couple of  minutes before it was out of sight moving towards the se traveling in a  straight line.
content.summary: Huge ufo passed overhead  at low altitude shrouded in a mist like cloud

content.detailedDescription: We were walking home from a friends house in casselberry, fl. a few of my friends and i saw an object in the sky with a light on it that was "blacklight" purple, then green, yellow, then orange but was mainly this bright purple color. it was doing all sorts of weird things too! quickly changing direction, doing small circles in the sky, hovering in one spot then moving a different direction. there was no sound. we watched it for about 3 minutes as it darted left and right, up an down in the sky. it was also stationery in the sky. it was joined by a smaller blinking object, then it headed north, north-east, toward sr 434. everyone was amazed and we had no idea of what this could possibly be.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange, bright purple object in sky that changed colors, darted around in the sky in casselberry, fl

content.detailedDescription:
While walking my dog on september 30th, 2014, i was watching the sky. prior to this night, i had seen things i couldn't explain. unfortunately, i didn't have my camera with me for those. when i first noticed the object it seemed to be headed opposite the usual passenger plane route from detroit metro airport. i wasn't sure what to think, so i snapped five or six pictures. 

three objects traveled together in a circle, flying in what seemed to be some formation. at some point the objects stopped circling, and headed southwest, toward lake michigan. at that point i lost sight of them.

i was excited to finally get a picture, as my family thinks i'm going crazy.
content.summary: I noticed the craft moving across the passenger plane path to metro airport

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 8:15pm cst on sunday, october 12th, 2014, i was walking my dog on 36th street, between gillham rd and warwick street, in kansas city, mo. in the se sky i noticed a light, on what appeared to be a helicopter. the light caught my attention because it wasn't like any other color that is typical of any aircraft. it was a soft amber light, and large like a spotlight. i noticed there were no other lights on the object. none of the required red and green lights, no flashing lights. i then noticed there was no sound coming from the object. i was trying to gauge how far it was from me when the light went out. the object was still completely visible, but there were no lights and still no sound. i continued to watch as it made its way to the nw. i was having a hard time discerning the shape, and then realized the object was spinning as it moved. the rotation of the object made it impossible to get a clear shape and the edges were more fuzzy than well defined. when i last looked at the object it appeared to be making an almost flapping motion, almost like a giant bird. it moved at a constant speed, and in a straight line. the speed was typical of a small aircraft. i followed it across the sky until i lost it due to buildings and trees. the whole event was so bizarre that i got in my car and tried to follow it, but never saw it again. i called to non emergency police line to see if any one had reported strange sightings, they said they hadn't received any. i also checked the internet, which brought me to this site. i would really like to be put in contact with someone else who saw this object. i know what airplanes, helicpters, gliders, balloons, blimps, etc. all look like, i know how they sound, i know how they move. this was unlike anything i've ever seen.
content.summary: Unidentifiable object moved across the sky on a fixed path and constant speed. it appeared to be spinning as it moved.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and two good friends take a camping trip to south dakota annually.  this year we decided to explore the black hills national forest.  we drove from the twin cities to south dakota on thursday june 19.  we arrived in rapid city the morning of friday june 20th and stopped at a camping store for supplies.

we didn't have a destination planned, so we purchased a national park map, spoke to a staff member at the local camping retailer, and more or less picked the most remote location on the map.  we drove about an hour and a half into the forest and parked our car at a camp ground. we geared up and began a hike up a nearby mountain.   the hike was very strenuous.  it was not a designated trail, and involved a lot of climbing over fallen trees. 

after a couple hours we reached the summit and found an area with a clearing in the trees and a suitable place to set up a base camp. we built a fire ring out of stones, started a fire, and ate dinner as it began to get dark.

that time of year the sun doesn't set until late.  it doesn't get completely dark until almost 10pm, but when it does the stars really come out   there was zero light pollution and not a cloud on the sky. we sat and admired the stars as we listened to music and talked about our plans to hike to the top of mountain peak tomorrow

as i was looking towards the horizon, i noticed a very unusually large star, giving off a lot of light.  it was just above the horizon and visible through the trees. it appeared to be hovering in place, but as it clearly was moving i figured it had to be a plane.  but as i watched it as best i could through the forest, i noticed it was clearly changing its path and trajectory. it was ascending and descending, shooting left , stopping, hovering, and zooming left and up again. 

i pointed this out to my two buddies. i shined the flash light on it , and said there's no-way that could be a plane. we were all observing the object now.  it was obviously under some kind of intelligent control, but wasn't making a sound. 

my friend jake said" turn down the music so maybe we can hear it."  as we did that, the ufo started to descend.  it was now below the tree line and began to come closer. i'm shining my light on it when the fear set in that this was not something that we could explain.  my buddy jeramy said "turn off the music, turn the light off!"

the object was giving off a lot of light.  it was so bright that it was illuminating all the grass below it, and causing the trees between its location and ours to cast shadows.  it was now maybe only 10-15 feet above the ground, and heading in the direction of our tent.  where we set up the fire was only about 100ft from the tent.  the object was now only a rocks throw away.

we all held our breathe, silent.  frozen in a fear that we are alone in the woods with this glowing object that has no explanation.

it reached a point directly above our tent and stopped.  there is a direct line of sight between our position and the object.  it seemed to turn and directly observe us. i began to move out of its view, but without ever taking my eyes off it. there seemed to be an energy in the air. this was the most powerful experience of my life. just as mysteriously as it arrived, it disappeared right in front of us...

we were all pretty shook. "wohw!"  so bizarre

"is it gone?  is it coming back?  are we ok?"  these are the questions going through our minds. we really didn't know if we were in danger.  we're all alone in the woods.  there is no immediate help.  we don't have the use of any cell phones, no weapons... 

it was really an incredible experience. we all asked each other if this really just happened. it would've been easier to simply block it out.  it's pretty mind blowing to become aware of something like this. we all agreed we all saw the same thing

i remember seeing a plane, and finding comfort in something i recognized and had an explanation for. 

we were all still pretty scared. i wanted to influence the the mentality of the group before panic set in. so i started the music and built the fire back up.

we were all throwing logs on the fire when all of a sudden, a flight flashed and an object went streaking across the sky above us leaving a tail behind it.  

it was tearing through the air and burning in bright colors as it lit up the forest below.  it began to fall into the canyon between the mountain we were on and the one across from us. as it fell, it exploded and burnt up in vibrant colors of blue, turquoise and aqua....  

"whoooow...... what was that."  jake said.  my only explanation was a meteorite. but i can't help but feel like this was directly related to the ufo.   i've seen hundreds of shooting stars in my life, but all have burned in colors of white or yellow, never blue. and rarely could i so much as hear one, much less be shook by its intensity as it burns up and explodes...

definitely a crazy night. [name removed/cms/dr] was tired and laid down. [name removed/cms/dr] and i stayed up and waited for the sun to rise.  

as we sat on the edge of the mountains talking about the experience, we witnessed two more ufos moving across the sky that night. the first was traveling at what appeared to be a very high altitude. it de-celerate, stopped, changed trajectory, accelerated, and then took off out of sight.

the second behaved in a similar matter

i had a video camera with me the whole night. i attempted to record all three objects. the camera could not make out the lights in the dark. there is however a few  seconds in the video where the first object can be seen through the trees darting up, down, left and right...

i'll never forget this night  i want to know what it was we saw, and would like to know if there were others that witnessed these lights around that time. i've done some research and know that many people have reported flying orbs behaving the same way

this is also not the first experience i've had like this.  i had a similar encounter with a ufo in australia. also witnessed by 3 other individuals where an object in the sky came down to us and disappeared

i'm happy to share more information if anyone who reads this, and would like to talk to more  with people who take this topic seriously .

[name removed/cms/dr]
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three campers witness ufo flying erratically in black hills national forest. glowing object descended down to our location illuminating forest  object disappears and a fireball streaks across the sky and bursts  as it falls

content.detailedDescription: Smoking in the backyard.Observed craft following jet liners. changed shape, specially length. left no contrails. first thought the aircraft was a drone. observed by two other witnesses. the craft followed one aircraft southeast, gained altitude until it could not be seen, then reappeared in the northwest and traveled southeast again before being obscured by cloud cover, which wasn't there to begin with. felt excited since this would be the fourth craft i've witnessed, second sighting with witnesses.
content.summary: Left no contrail, rapid movement, direction change , followed planes

content.detailedDescription:
Counted over 15 balls of light in the sky zipping around then forming what was a massive triangle counted 4 triangle and one big orb of light that was independently not in formation and moving across the sky and leaving a light trail as zipped across the sky 
and then really just hovered in on place in the sky as anouther orb of light. showed up  could have bin a  mile away to the  left of the main ufo  and when the main ufo would. shoot  straight up at an alarming speed the lil ufo would follow  then.  the ufo  formed  a couple triangle 3 ufo per triangle 4 triangles this was at 445am 45 min after i started watching the sky i was going to work to be in for 630  i was looking out my living room window
what made me notice was the odd lights just hanging out in a sky  with a sky with no clouds
i knew it was a ufo lately there has bin server all times where in star gazing and notice 
the classic stop and go up and down moves and high speeds glowing stronger then any start or plane could every glow or move like the ufo move only saw 2 of the ufo  only glowed brighter then the rest  one was glowing so bright it was unreal and it was bigger then the rest
anouther one was moving accross the sky and it was flashing orange red and white light in squance then randomly the in sequence almost like a repeat message with lights
then that ufo and the rest formed triangles the size of football fields and then smaller ones and then the big bright one was the tip or top of a massive just massive delta wing with the bright ufo on the tip and 2 smaller less bright ones as the outher points in the deltawing watched i till the sun came up them the just went translusant  and you would never know it was there. i felt at peace with it not very scary but then again i always seem to spot these triangle formations
content.summary: Counted over 15 balls of light in the sky zipping around then forming what was a massive triangle counted 4 triangle and one big orb of light that was independently not in formation and moving across the sky and leaving a light trail as zipped across the

content.detailedDescription:
on his deathbed, j, employee of raython, an electronic engineer, decided to reveal secret material he had read from a computer he was working on at carswell afb fort worth texas in the 1960s.  the subject of roswell new mexico had been discussed many times – i, stating that the facts strongly imply the government/military are flat out not disclosing the truth of the event.  j, would smile and say it was a possibility.  on his deathbed, j brought up the subject and said he accidentally came across computer files on the subject during his job at fort worth.  he claimed that there was a crash of a flying disk of unknown origin, there were bodies of an unknown humanoid creature, that there were other crashes including one in 1963 in which a craft was recovered.  he wanted us to know – he would be violating the secrets act or whatever top secret status he held by revealing this information but it did not matter now that he would be dead in a day or two.  

	my wife c told stories of the small people who came to “play” with her at the swing and slide in her back yard.  this was in fort worth texas – the same time j, her father, was at the airbase – the same time some of the craft were, according to the computer file j read, at the fort worth base.  c use to readily talk about these strange small people who, by her description, match those of grey aliens, reported by abductees.  this all changed one night i shall never forget.  after that night, c never acknowledged saying any such story – claimed ufo and alien contact is bunk, will not examine any evidence and gets emotionally hostile if the subject is brought up.  she is derisive of others holding such beliefs and gets angry – her personality underwent a dramatic change, which she denies as well, but from that day forward, she was no longer the woman i married – something in her was fundamentally altered.

	the event took place in the mid 1980s, but i have no exact date – i was frightened beyond words and felt no one would believe me – might even lock me up as insane, so i kept it to myself.  as i have read other accounts, i now think i can give a testimony.

	before i write the account of that night, i wish to state that i can remember two other times i have had potential abduction events – both before i was married about age 18 – both in the same year.  the first was at night listening to a real to real tape with headphones in my bedroom – the tape was three hours long and i had just started it.   i blinked and the tape was finished and the reel was going around – so three or more hours had passed in that blink.
	the other time i woke and creatures were pulling by out of my body and through my bedroom wall – this was 1968 and i had never heard of any alien descriptions but the things pulling me through the wall match the alien grey description to a perfect match.

	one other significant piece of information is the continual attempts c and i had to have children, with miscarriage after miscarriage – seven in all.

	we went to bed and fell asleep – i awoke to my cat growling.  the cat was on the bed next to my armpit and she was hunched down, ears back and growling in threat or fear.  her gaze was fixed on the open doorway to our bedroom and as i became instantly alert i glanced at the time – one o’clock in the morning.  ruth, the cat, continued to fix her gaze on something i could not see, yet it was light enough in the room to see into the hall and all around the bedroom – i saw nothing.  ruth continued to growl and back into my armpit hissing, head lowered, ears back – she watched something – her head and gaze followed as if something entered the room, moved toward the end of the bed and around it toward my wife's side.   

	when the cats gaze rested on the area next to my wife, about where her head and shoulders are, suddenly, without warning, c sat bolt upright and started screaming at the to of her lungs such as i have never heard her before.   such terror and such screaming went on and on – i was frozen with fear.  i don't know if i could not move because i was so scared or if i was paralyzed by something – the fact is, i did not move and i was experiencing such fear as i cannot ever remember.

	i do not know how long this went on – all i can remember i have now written – the next thing i can remember is being awake and looking at the clock – i did not fall asleep, it was like blinking my eyes and the time was gone – it was suddenly after three.  the time loss was the same as the event with the tape recorder – blink and hours are gone – same position in the room and all but i blink and time is gone.

	my wife changed that night.  she will not talk about aliens, abductions, ufos, and is not open to the possibility of their existence – even though she was and had see ufos and aliens before that night according to her own accounts which she now has no memory of and denies and such things or ever telling such stories.  her basic personality changed that night – many things – how she thinks of me, how she relates to me, how she is as a person – all different.  i do not know what happened – the event fits certain other peoples experiences who are saying alien abduction but i saw nothing other than what i have related.

i am certain that these are not the only times we have been taken, if that is what is happening.  i do not feel safe.

what happened to us?
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription: Being driven home at 4 am by a taxi, just in front of cuicuilco ruins, i saw a car driven by 2 or 3 pale green 1.5 mts high beings with mao sweaters, 2 of which where turning back to us (20 mts away). they seemed to have tranced the driver to slow the speed & change lanes, while planting in my mind an accident scene, which indeed happened 30 seconds later. this enabled me to react & cover myself to receive an 100 km/hr rear impact & survive.
content.summary: Telepathic commmunication & visual contact 20 mts away

content.detailedDescription: Not sure what i saw but maybe you guys do. got a few pictures. disappeared into the sunset.
content.summary: Was at a friends lake house on the back patio over lake michigan and saw a thing in the sky so i took out my phone to snap some shots that later i realized turned out pretty good.

content.detailedDescription:
We were all outside, celebrating my mother's birthday on sept. 7th 1991, in ferncreek kentucky. it was about eight p.M. or so, dark, but not completely dark. just enough light in the sky to cause an orange horizon. 

   my mother spotted them first, and brought them to the attention of the rest of the people at her party. there were several witnesses, about 6 or 7 people. i assume all had been drinking, but it was still a bit early in the day, so i would say drinking, but not intoxicated. 

  when i looked up in to the sky, i was floored at what i saw. i was looking at something you would see only in the movies. my grandfather was a huge believer and had witnessed u.F.O.'s before, so i was pretty familiar with them, just had not seen anything for myself before that night. all i could do is stand there and watch with amazement.

   i seen 4 or 5 lights, all different colors (my memory is a bit foggy on the minor details, they might have been white lights...But seems to me they were of different color.) at around 500 to 1,000 feet in the sky, almost directly above our heads. if i had to guess, they were about the size of a wrecking ball, but from my perspective, they were the size of a basket ball. 

  so these lights were in the sky, seemingly playing "tag" with each other. i got the impression they wanted to be seen. they "played" with one another for about 20 to 30 seconds or so, swirling about, zig zagging around each other, then one at a time, shot straight up in to the sky at speeds that should have been a physical impossibility. they shot straight up and in to the void of the sky, one at a time. they shot up at roughly .5 second intervals of one another. they moved at speeds that were a physical impossibility then, and if that same exact event were to take place now, they would be moving at speeds impossible to achieve today. 

   i have not seen anything like it since then. i was 16 years old at the time. i am 39 now. they were not lasers, they were not helicopters or anything else man made. a person would have to be a complete idiot to think they were anything other than extraterrestrial.
content.summary: 4 to 5 light orbs, appeared to be

content.detailedDescription: While i was working at nephi airport several people saw two white orbs in the sky, someone mentioned that it could be a weather balloon but i found this to be odd because i know for a fact that the winds at the elevation of these orbs were ripping at 50 miles an hour all day. these orbs hovered above mt.Nebo for three hours without moving and then suddenly vanished. ive been in the military, and i was practically raised on an airport. i have never heard of any military or civilian aircraft like these orbs. and there is no way it was any balloon. ufo stuff is popping off here in utah.
content.summary: While working at the nephi airport several people includong myself saw two white orbs in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Basically it was on friday,  october 10th at around 2pm.  the clouds in the sky above where i was standing, in front of the mt shasta mall in redding, ca,  caught my eye.  they looked like someone had taken a brush and pulled them back leaving cool brushstrokes. anyways i snapped a picture, went to post it on instagram, and when i cropped it i noticed the object. that's all i can really tell you.
content.summary: Took a picture of clouds that caught my eye above mt shasta mall in the sky,  and didn't notice the object till i cropped the pic

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home and as soon as i saw it i knew it was a ufo and not an airplane.  it was  about 1km away and hovering.  i immediately pulled over and took a video of it.  it was pulsating many different colours...So bright.  i was awestruck.  amazing.
content.summary: Saw an object hovering and pulsating with lots of different colours very bright

content.detailedDescription: Was in my house and my friend was leaving at around 11pm it was a dark clear night standing at the door as he left we were drawn to really bright star just looked out of place kept catching it in corner off eye wasent untill we looked at it we could see it was pulsating reds white blue thats when i went back in house and got camera and got a few photos never thought much about it untill i put photos on laptap was a bit shocked at photos couldent figure out wot was in pics still a mystery no one been able to explain them yet
content.summary: It was a bright pulsating light that i watched for over 10 min before it dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was going out to my vehicle on my lunch break ( i work 3rd shift ) when a flashing star-like object caught my eye. i continued to watch it for a few minutes, intrigued, expecting to see it move, assuming it was an airplane. however, the object stayed stationary and continued to blink in a strobe like pattern between blue, red and white. it was very far away so it is hard to say if it was completely spherical or if it was elongated. i called upon some people in a forum who dismissed it as ( possibly ) sirius. idk, this was the most vibrantly "twinkling" star i've ever seen and its colors were vet distinct, more so than what my iphone was able to capture. it was located in the east/se sky. i am in kalamazoo, michigan. there was no sound. it stayed stationary the whole time i observed it between 3:30am-4:30am.
content.summary: Flashing star-like object

content.detailedDescription:
I went go a rooftop café with a friend. it was a sunny day in sofia on the 30rd of sept 2014. 
as the place and the view were new to me i took several pictures of the mountain. the sunlight was strong so i couldn't really see my iphone screen (especially the small window of the app hipstamatic i used to get a retro filter). 
after i went back to our table at the shadow, i looked at the photos taken short seconds one after or other. that's when i noticed a flying object on one of them. 
i talked to a friend who is scientific and interested in the topic and he send me your website.
content.summary: Flying object captured on a random panoramic photo

content.detailedDescription:
This is not a ufo sighting report but a historical report from april 2002 when i came upon the head of either a deer or elk in the gallatin ntl. forest in montana at approx. +44.823916 -111.245975. there is a mountain called mt. hebgen near this area. 

i had spent a few days in april 2002 volunteering for an animals rights group and we were out in the field all day long - snow still on the ground; sunny days but cold nights. the cabin where we stayed was on the north side of hebgen lake road. during one of my volunteer days, i saw a dead deer along the madison river - clearly it had perished from the winter cold and had some predator marks on it. large wolf prints were abundant in the area; howls at night. elk and deer were spotted and lots of buffalo. 

on the morning that i was to leave, i had a horrible urge to hike up into the mountains to the north of the cabin. i just had to hike. i got started early in the morning around 7 a.M. as the rest of the volunteers went out toward the hebgen lake area for another day of volunteering. the organization provides boots and snow shoes as well as other winter gear for volunteers in an outside shed.  i put on boots but chose not to use snowshoes because i did not think i would be out long and the snow was frozen from the night before enabling one to walk on top of it.  

it had lightly snowed the previous night and there was about 2 to 3 inches of powder snow over the old, hard snow.  i marveled at the beauty of the snow on the evergreen trees.  my boots crunched against the frozen snow but i was able to easily walk on it though it was a bit slow because of the incline and also because i had to maneuver a bit through the trees.  after a while there was almost a path in which i could easily pass between the trees. i was heading north and to my left i could see some rocky outcroppings and as the sun came out, it hit these and made a beautiful site.  bird were chirping. for some reason, the fact that there was the light, fresh snow all around me was very much in my mind.  

i have no idea how long it was before i came around a corner and before me was a clearing of sorts which looked like one could then go toward the left or proceed a bit to the right.  but in the middle of this clearing i saw a dark object and as i proceeded closer i realized it was the head of a large deer or small elk. i immediately became spooked because the snow all around it was untouched.  the powder-type show was pristine in that clearing and there was the head lieing there somewhat facing me as if someone had carefully placed it there. there was no neck.  no blood on the snow or on the head anywhere. the clean, pure snow really did spook me - the observation that there was no snow on the head added to my growing fright. i think it was around this point that i realized that there were no birds chirping.  it was extremely silent and i could hear my breath and i was sweating (most likely due to the hike).  

though i was scared,i actually crept toward the head and stooped down at the right, front side to look closely.  the ears were gone.  not torn out but as if sliced off and i recall that i could see a hole into the head where the right ear used to be.  the left earhole was not as visible from where i was.  i noted that there was no indication that the animal had had horns.  either a young animal or a female (deer or elk i just don't know).  

the eyes were missing, too.  cleanly removed in circles so that there were two blank holes.  the upper and lower lips were also gone so i could see the teeth. i tried to reason in my head that if a predator did it, it would be torn/jagged and not a smooth cut as this was. i do not know if the tongue was gone because the mouth was closed - just missing its lips. again, there were no prints of any animals around and the snow was pristine all around this head - it was in a clearing with no trees overhead.  

another observation that really spooked me was the fact that the skull had a perfect round hole in the top of it. i have to estimate that it was about the size of a half-dollar. it was cleanly cut - again, i thought to myself if a predator wanted to eat the brain, how in the world could it make a cleanly cut hole like that.  i could not really see down into the head but it did appear that the brain was missing.  the fur did not look decomposed - in fact, if it were not for these other oddities, the head and the fur looked to be in good condition. fresh. not old and decomposing or mis-shapen.  again, i compare this with the site of the dead deer on the madison river which had clearly been roughed up by predators.  this was not.  the silence was really getting to me. the fact that there were no prints or other disturbances around the head - the fact that it appeared to have been placed or dropped there from above - and the silence really scared me.  i remember backing up and thinking over and over in my head "this can't be a mutilation could it?",  "this can't be a mutilation could it?".  it was not a cow or a horse. it was just a head - not an entire animal.  but how could you explain such a sight and to put the final nail in the coffin, everything around had a light dusting of snow on it except for this head - no snow on it.  it was on top of the freshly laid snow.  it was as if someone was mocking me - i turned to head back to where i had come from.  the sun was out now and unbelievably, my feet were now breaking through the snow and it would go up to my knees or thighs as i had to push my way through the snow. slow going because of this. by the time i got back to the cabin, it was around 11:30 a.M. and i was exhausted.  

i took off my boots and left them in the outside shed where all of the other supplies were kept.  i did not go in to say goodbye to anyone.  i just felt like i had to get out of there. i felt embarrassed that i had gone hiking alone without telling anyone (everyone knows you do not go hiking alone or not tell anyone where you are going) - and i also thought that it was stupid of me to not have used snowshoes.  there was just something strange about how i felt and acted when i returned to the cabin. my bags were already in my car and i was just concerned about getting back to ogden, utah in a decent amount of time (where my mom lived). i felt it was important to share this on mufon - i have been a mufon fi in so. ca for a couple of years now, and have never had the time to submit this. 
  
i am hoping that this information will be helpful as more information is gathered on mutilations.  i have had strange experiences my entire life, but on that particular morning, i - truthfully - would have more expected to run into a sasquatch than a mutilated head which was the farthest thing from my mind that morning when i had that urge to take a hike.
content.summary: This is a historical report on the finding of a mutilated animal in the gallatin ntl. forest of montana in early april 2002.

content.detailedDescription:
During the blood moon i was outside of my home by the middle school when when i saw three bright lights heading my way coming from the west.I went in side and got my dad and we both went outside.When we got outside the thing was about ready to go over us.As in did there was a jet like sound and it seemed so close i could feel like if ii climbed the a tree a could touch it. as it began to bass the back had blue,white and red light blinking in turn.
my dad had worked at boeing for many years he said it was a plain but then said he didn't know what it was.The last i could see of it was when it went past the tree line heading towards star lake.The next day i saw to of them same height but heading towards olimpia. there was one more that a buddy and i saw coming back from elma ponds by the fair grounds then disappeared when we went over the free way.These events happen the two three day when the moon was big and orange,and the lights seemed to be the same lights like the last sighting but also had a green light. i saw a post here that some one saw something like the same thing just wanted to say i saw something weird to good eye.I am a believer so i didn't feel weird.There is a lot of military around here for a small town. i have also seen from time to time men walking with black suits waring black sun glasses.I saw one of them walking down young st with a military walk and hands cuffed with combat boots walking the same rout as those things.One last thing i think there making a d.U.M.B with our unfinished nuke sight.There are big big drills the last time i went up there.Please report any weird things you see in elma,wa
content.summary: Big three white lights on font left center right about five feet apart making a jet like nose in the back where red,blue,white lights blinking in pattern

i will discuss this on the phone with a qualified professional.

thank you
content.summary: Was riding my bike during national forest day and took 2 pictures of my bike. one had the object, the other did not.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was outside. installing  a tail light on the car and was playing around with the led lights i was installing.. my daughter was outside also just playing around. until she looked up and pointed while calling my name saying daddy what's that in the sky.. i was like what... so i looked up and saw the object in the sky, and at first thought it was a trash can bag floating in the sky until i saw shape transformation in it. it looked like it was floating in the air and hovering. i was like that's no plane or helicopter at all... it started monving southeast direction until i looked down for just a second and it moved quickly across the sky to the other side of the sky on the north side like a blink of an eye. i said to my daughter how did that thing move from one point to the other like that.. 
i told my duaghter to go get my phone so i can see it better.. so she went inside the house to go get the phone .. while she did that i kept observing the object on the sky and noticed that it was changing shape and moving slowly southeast and gettng higher in elevation, as soon as my daughter came back with the phone i zoomed in on the object but was not even a clear view . was going to record it but didn't even bother. so i just viewed it until it disappaered into the clouds. i was like wow amazing..W
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Daughter said daddy what's that in the sky and pointed to it and that's when i looked and saw it in the sky
